mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_purchase_history ( user_id, product_id, product_count, price, destination_id ) SELECT cart.user_id AS user_id, cart.product_id AS product_id, cart.product_count AS product_count, product.price AS price, #{destinationId} FROM tbl_cart AS cart JOIN mst_product AS product ON cart.product_id = product.id WHERE cart.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select:
SELECT
purchase.purchased_at AS purchased_at, product.product_name AS product_name, product.price AS price, purchase.product_count AS product_count, destination.family_name AS family_name, destination.first_name AS first_name, destination.address AS address FROM tbl_purchase_history AS purchase JOIN mst_product AS product ON purchase.product_id = product.id JOIN mst_destination AS destination ON purchase.destination_id = destination.id WHERE purchase.user_id = #{userId} AND purchase.status = 1 ORDER BY purchased_at DESC
